KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumMatrix compareNE 023
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareLE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareNE function to compare two NumMatrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each NumMatrix are compared to determine whether one NumMatrix is equal to the other.

Syntax.Note: The value of the first NumMatrix is greater than the value of the second NumMatrix.
The value of the first Matrix is lesser than the value of the second Matrix.
